name: The Shape of Happiness
summary:
How many days has it been...
Since seeing another human?

Since having grandma's home-made baked potatoes?

A human named Cassie is travelling on the road one fateful day, when an accident sends her into a world vastly different from hers.

- The Shape World!

She meets strange shapes, learning about this odd world as she tries to find her way back to Earth. But as peculiar as the Shape World is, it is not what it seems to be.

This is a kinetic visual novel - the dialogue choices don't deviate the main story, but affect some small things and bits of dialogue variation!
